pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Regression Models with Compositional Data // Spatial regression models with compositional responses using the alpha --transformation. Relevant papers include: Tsagris M. (2025), doi:10.48550/arXiv.2510.12663, Tsagris M. (2015), https://soche.cl/chjs/volumes/06/02/Tsagris(2015).pdf, Tsagris M.T., Preston S. and Wood A.T.A. (2011), doi:10.48550/arXiv.1106.1451.
